attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we petition the Prime Minister to speak to Lord Mandelson with a view to stopping him from claiming allowances as a member of the House of Lords whilst a Minister of State drawing a substantial salary and tax free expenses

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
